subject: Pharmacy at your service
body:
Dear customer.
Tired of paying twice the price of a med when buying it from a "reliable" licensed USA Web pharmacy? Our discount Canadian e-shop will show you what real "low prices" should look like.
At CanadianPharmacy you will always be able to find the generic drugs you need and they will be a lot cheaper that those sold in the USA. CanadianPharmacy is a licensed Canadian e-shop, which lets it (and you too) turn the Canadian drug taxation system to its advantage.
CanadianPharmacy the easiest and the cheapest way to take care of your health.
Yours faithfully,Aurora Puckett
